welcome.message: Hi there! Welcome to the test portal for panel members. Click {action} to start a panel.

panel.panels_avail: Please choose one of the panels listed below.

help.select_panel: You may choose a panel from the list above. After you choose a panel, the panel will start. Further instructions will follow after.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: For an overview, please select one of the items. You can choose the following from the list: Panel Members, Panels or Organisations.

help.select_item: You may choose an item from the list to the left to get an overview.
